article_html:
Before Tom McLaughlin turned children’s author he was a newspaper cartoonist, so now he’s made this lesson for a bit of election fun! Which politician are you going to doodle?

Tom McLaughlin’s new book is The Accidental Prime Minister
text:
Before Tom McLaughlin turned children’s author he was a newspaper cartoonist, so now he’s made this lesson for a bit of election fun! Which politician are you going to doodle?

Tom McLaughlin’s new book is The Accidental Prime Minister
title: How to draw… a political cartoon
